title: laaaaaaaaaaag.

embed.description: Super simple and lightning fast image sharing. Upload clipboard images with Copy & Paste and image files with Drag & Drop

body: this is my tracert of me pinging the league server that i have been told to do, nobody has replied to me so i thought i would make another discussion, please help me this is not fair or fun at all and makes me mad at league for having all this money and still having crap servers.

replies.body:
Hey there,

I did [reply to you in your previous thread 19 hours ago](http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/gameplay-strategy/imzAezuT-why-is-the-oce-server-so-bad?comment=0002).

You are yet to answer.

I'll copy the reply here just in case you missed it, please keep all future responses in this thread.

-----

Hey there,

This sounds like it might be a problem with your ISP, however let's first rule out anything on your end by having you run through the [Troubleshooting Connection Issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) support article, if nothing there helps could you please do the following for me.

* [Download WinMTR](https://sourceforge.net/projects/winmtr/files/WinMTR-v092.zip/download) and run a traceroute to the following IP. (Allow this to run for 5-15 minutes)
  * 103.240.227.5
* Once adequate time has passed, stop the traceroute, export your results as text.
* Run the [ICSI netalyzr](http://netalyzr.icsi.berkeley.edu/).
* Post back with a link to your WinMTR results (You can use [pastebin](http://pastebin.com/) for this) and the url to your ICSI netalyzr results.
